text: Cut Bank is a city in Glacier County, Montana, United States. The population of Cut Bank was 3,056 in 2020. The Cut Bank Creek flows past the city. The Cherokee Trail, which was a historic overland trail, ended in Cut Bank. The Blackfeet Indian Reservation is located just west of the city. The city of Cut Bank turned 100 years old on May 11, 2011. == References == ==Other websites== *Official city of Cut Bank website Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana Category:1911 establishments in the United States Category:1910s establishments in Montana
title: Cut Bank, Montana
